Options Dialog Behavior Tab

Use the Dialog Behavior tab in the Options dialog box (View | Options | Dialog Behavior tab) to set which project or versioned file actions invoke a dialog box. For example, when you select Action | Get, Version Manager can either display or not display a dialog box before processing the action. The dialog box lets you set options for the action.

Field Descriptions

Project Actions
Get Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Get on a project or project database.
Check Out Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Check Out on a project or project database.
Unlock Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Unlock on a project or project database.
Lock Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Lock on a project or project database.
Show History Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Show History on a project or project database.
Versioned File Actions
Get/View Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Get on a versioned file.
Check Out/Edit Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Check Out on a versioned file.
Unlock Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Unlock on a versioned file.
Lock Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Lock on a versioned file.
Show History Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Show History on a versioned file.
Show Difference Select to display a dialog box when you use Action | Show Difference on a versioned file.
Other
Automatically dismiss result dialogs when action is successful Select to automatically close the results dialog box when the action is successful. Otherwise, you must click Close to dismiss the results dialog box.
Show Copy Options Dialog Select to display the Copy Project dialog box when copying projects or versioned files. The Copy Project dialog box enables you to change whether or not project archives will be copied to the destination location, what configuration file will be used, and whether to create a new access control database, use the existing access control database, or copy the access control database. The dialog box also controls whether or not subprojects are included in the action.

See Also

Setting Dialog Display Options
